Name: Fruit Tree Daiquiri
Ingredients: 50 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
15 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
5 ml Syrup from Luxardo Maraschino Cherries
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist and skewered Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and discarded.
Review: Even with a spoon of cherry syrup, this is fruity and balanced rather than sweet with rum holding its own as the dominant flavour.
Nutrition: One serving of Fruit Tree Daiquiri contains 163 calories
